channel.title: D claws! [read]
channel.description:
I want to know how to add a spec to my dclaws.
I already have the Item ID : 3101 - as my dclaws. It looks exactly like dclaws.
It also has a special bar. I just need to know how to use the spec. Whenever I click the spec bar and attack another player, it doesn't actually do the spec. It just does a regular hit.
